findings.rationale: The obligation to maintain confidentiality in perpetuity may pose a risk as it could prevent the parties from using information freely in the future.
findings.evidence_quote: The obligations under this Agreement shall continue in perpetuity and shall survive any termination of discussions between the parties.

findings.rationale: The lack of limitations on indemnification could expose a party to significant financial risk due to unforeseen liabilities.
findings.evidence_quote: Each party shall indemnify and hold harmless the other party from and against all claims, losses, damages, and expenses, without limit, arising out of any breach of this Agreement.

findings.rationale: The absence of liability limitations can result in extensive financial exposure for either party in case of a breach or dispute.
findings.evidence_quote: Notwithstanding any other provision, neither party's liability shall be limited under this Agreement.

findings.rationale: The exclusive ownership of all work product by Company A may deter collaboration and innovation from Company B's side.
findings.evidence_quote: All work product and deliverables created hereunder shall be owned exclusively by Company A.

findings.rationale: The prevailing party's right to recover attorneys' fees may discourage parties from pursuing legitimate claims due to potential cost burdens.
findings.evidence_quote: The prevailing party in any dispute shall be entitled to recover all attorneys' fees and costs from the non-prevailing party.
